page.title: 14Transport in the area
page.content: Soutmoor is on the Oxford/Swindon bus route.The 1st bus to Oxford is 07.39 each day and on Sat. 07.39.The last bus from Oxford is 18.05.On Fri.-Sat. a later bus leaves Oxford at 23.00. The 1st bus from Southmoor to Swindon is 10.30 (Mon.-Fri.),and on Sat. 08.30. Last bus is 18.30.No buses on Sunday. Buses come approx. every 2 hours. On Monday and Thursday 2 free buses take peole to Tesco in Abingdon at 09.15 and 14.00 leaving Tesco at 13.15 and 16.00. Southmoor is the Oxford bus' terminus. Buses take children to schools in Faringdon,Cumnor and Abingdon. South Midland's buses provide special tickets which enables people to travel cheaply. The A420 is an extremely busy bus route which cuts the village in half.
